h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Red Loong - Chapter 1 Secret Dragon Boss
content: Take the first left, past the big stone rock. And then follow it around to the right. This will bring you to the section of the path, where there’s a small bridge going right and a chest on the left. Head down toward the chest, and a voice should start speaking to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Red Loong - Chapter 1 Secret Dragon Boss'.
The content is as follows:
Take the first left, past the big stone rock. And then follow it around to the right. This will bring you to the section of the path, where there’s a small bridge going right and a chest on the left. Head down toward the chest, and a voice should start speaking to you.
